snippet.title: Cult of the Lamb | Pilgrim Pack Reveal Trailer | Out Now
snippet.description:
Introducing Pilgrim, a brand new interactive adventure that will show the world of Cult of the Lamb as you’ve never seen it before, with characters new and old to meet and mysteries to uncover.

The Pilgrim Pack includes:

The full Pilgrim story and bonus pages!
2 unique Follower quests
5 new Follower forms
2 new outfits for your Followers to wear
5 new decorations


Visit our website for more info: https://www.devolverdigital.com/

Subscribe for more: https://shorturl.at/PP3ed

Follow Devolver Digital
X/Twitter:  https://twitter.com/devolverdigital
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/DevolverDigital/
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/devolverdigital/
TikTok:   https://www.tiktok.com/@devolverdigital

#indiegames #devolver #digital
